Title: An Act Changing the Name of Zambales Provincial Hospital to President Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 28
An Act Changing the Name of Zambales Provincial Hospital to President Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Hospital
Section 1. The name of Zambales Provincial Hospital in the Province of Zambales is hereby changed to President Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Hospital.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 20, 1979
